settings.title: About
settings.footer_text: With unbridled imagination, exquisite taste, keen eye for color combinations and attention to detail, Ema considers every woman to be an individual work of art who deserves to be framed in an equally original work of art. Once you see an original Ema Savahl, you recognize it immediately, because it is truly unique. Once you wear an Ema Savahl, you will never feel the same.

settings.heading:
Handcrafted
Wearable Art
settings.subheading:
The Perfect Fit for a
Powerful Woman

settings.text: Add some descriptive text to your all collections page.

settings.shortdescription: Celebrity Custom Couture for A-Listers and Common Folks
Women of Tomorrow’s 2nd Annual Rosé Day Raises $100,000
BEST MIAMI FASHION DESIGNERS TO KNOW RIGHT NOW
Meet Ema Koja of Ema Savahl Couture

settings.title: Made by Ema, Made for You
settings.text: The Haute Couture by Ema Savahl is a highly customized process in which Ema and her team get to know your specific fit, inspirations and physical expression, in order to make a custom timeless piece. Work directly with Ema to sort through patterns and fits and allow her creativity and imagination to design something truly unique. Clients from around the world have relied on Ema for their most exquisite fashion pieces, and such designs and customization process is now available to you.

settings.testimonial: Whenever a red carpet event is upcoming, I always reach out to Ema for my dress. Her designs continue to “wow!” my fans and the media!
Ema’s designs are incredible! She was so attentive to my design inspiration and created something absolutely spectacular!
I saw one of Ema’s designs and instantly fell in love. It’s my favorite dress! The unique paint she uses actually warms and fits to your body for a more personal fit.
Ema’s work is so unique. The process of getting my dress made was so personalized too.
